channel.title: Help with teleports
channel.description:
ok so u know how when u click minigame teleport it comes up with options in the chat box of a bunch of minigames? i want to remove that so that when u click on the teleport it takes u directly too 1 place only. like regular teleporting
i tried from clicking buttons but when i removed the options all it did was either give a list with no options and the teleports didnt work then or the teleport wouldnt work at all and nothing would happen?
any step by step instructions? thanks ill rep

item.title: Help with teleports
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“disastercall, post:7, topic:440226”]cool it worked

gana rep in a sec

damn i need 15 rep -_- can u rep me so i can rep u? or ill rep u as soon as i get 15?[/quote]

Against the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with teleports
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

case 50235:
case 4140:
case 117112:
c.getPA().spellTeleport(201, 49, 0);
break;

item.title: Help with teleports
item.dc:creator: @disastercall disastercall
item.description:
@disastercall wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:4, topic:440226”][quote author=disastercall link=topic=542904.msg3978941#msg3978941 date=1335013282]

When it clicks it it does startOption or chooseOption you want it to say startTeleport… So find the clickingbutton ID for it. And post the code down,
[/quote]

i dont want it to say start teleport i just want it to teleport me and say nothing at all

i tried it but it gave me an error saying

required: int, int, int, string found: int, int

case 50235: case 4140: case 117112: c.getDH().sendOption5("Rock Crabs", "Experiments", "Slayer Tower", "Brimhaven Dungeon", "Sea Snake Lair"); c.teleAction = 1; break;

This is the code from clicking buttons this is for the monster teleport[/quote]

it gave me an error

it was like this

required: int, int, int, string
found: int, int

Read full topic

item.title: Help with teleports
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

disastercall:

When it clicks it it does startOption or chooseOption you want it to say startTeleport… So find the clickingbutton ID for it. And post the code down,

i dont want it to say start teleport i just want it to teleport me and say nothing at all

case 50235: case 4140: case 117112: c.getDH().sendOption5("Rock Crabs", "Experiments", "Slayer Tower", "Brimhaven Dungeon", "Sea Snake Lair"); c.teleAction = 1; break;

This is the code from clicking buttons this is for the monster teleport
[/quote]

case 50235:
case 4140:
case 117112:
c.getPA().startTeleport(X COOORD, Y COORD);

Read full topic
